title: Tour de France Stage 14: Pogačar Wreaks Vengeance on Vingegaard With Mountaintop Victory, Evenepoel Loses Time
content:
Yellow jersey Pogačar explodes away in final 4km of summit finish to move two minutes clear on GC as Evenepoel slides to third after punishing day in the Pyrénées.

Read the full article at Tour de France Stage 14: Pogačar Wreaks Vengeance on Vingegaard With Mountaintop Victory, Evenepoel Loses Time on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
